description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
41374 - Set Print job name while printing Excel spreadsheets
 
Enhancements
41229 - RTL (Right to Left) language support in the converted files (PDF, TIFF, HTML, etc.)
 
Exceptions
41371 - FormatException during file’s opening
41376 - Exception: Index was out of range
41401 - Finding Hidden rows - Set Add-ins formula
41382 - Export to PDF - formatting is not correct
41419 - Worksheet.Calculateformula is throwing error
41405 - Cell.HtmlString throws IndexOutOfRangeException
41392 - CellsException: “Invalid cell name” - while converting Excel file to PDF
41431 - Exception: “Index was out of range”
 
Bugs
41369 - Problem with exporting workbook having conditional formatting to PDF
41270 - Angled text does not render correctly, it renders straight
41190 - ToTiff function Issue - Cell Orientation
40865 - Text orientation rendering issue
41413 - Aspose.Cells is corrupting an Excel document after re-save
41412 - Wrong direction and text alignment of Visio Shapes used in Excel to PDF conversion
40879 - Financial and DateTime formulas calculation issues
41368 - XLSX file gets corrupted after processing with Aspose.Cells
41367 - Setting the value for Filters in PivotTable
41409 - Issue with refreshing the PivotTable
41389 - Some portion of data which is not visible in the output PDF
41411 - Save XLSX to HTML - formatting error
41424 - Opening an XLSM and saving as XLSX results in a corrupted file
41406 - DATEDIF formula / function issue
41399 - Backgrounds aren't kept in the XLSX documents
41375 - Problem with external reference for data validation
41366 - Bug in MATCH function with 2 INDIRECT formulas
41350 - Workbook.CalculateFormula is very slow
41309 - Image Created differently from PC to PC
41415 - Trouble with opening an XLSX file
41427 - Excel won't finish loading - Excel 2013 file
41400 - Worksheet value/input changes on Save
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
